data.news_body: In compliance with the provisions of Regulation 39 (3) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015, we would like to submit that the share certificate no. 1505, bearing distinctive nos. 565991 to 566758 for 768 equity shares, registered under Folio No. 027980 is reported lost and the holders of these shares have requested to issue duplicate share certificate in lieu of the original.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Period Ending September 30,2022 And Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On November 14, 2022.
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e., on November 14,2022 has approved:
1) the Company's Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the period ending September 30,2022 and the Auditor's Reports (copies enclosed) thereon.
2) the grant of Options to the eligible employees under the Employees Stock Options Scheme- 2022 (ESOP Scheme-2022) of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ending June 30,2022 And Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 11, 2022.
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e., on August 11,2022 has approved the Company's Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the quarter ending June 30,2022 and the Auditor's Reports (copies enclosed) thereon.
We confirm having submitted the Auditor's Report with unmodified opinions and the Financial Results for the quarter ending June 30, 2022, as per the format prescribed in Schedule III of the Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter Ending June 30,2022 And Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On August 11, 2022.
data.news_body:

We confirm having submitted the Auditor's Report with unmodified opinions and the Financial Results for the quarter ending June 30, 2022, as per the format prescribed in Schedule III of the Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Re-Submission Of Half Yearly Disclosure On Related Party Transactions Pursuant To Regulation 23(9) Of SEBI (Listing Obligations And Disclosure Requirements) (Amendments) Regulations, 2018 For The Period Commencing From 1St October 2021 To 31St March 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI Circular No. SEBI/HO/CFD/CMD1/CIR/P/2021/662 dated November 22, 2021, the Listed Entities are required to submit the half yearly (i.e., from 1st October 2021 to 31st March 2022) Related Party Disclosure in the revised format. We had on 27th April 2022 submitted the Company's Related Party Transaction Report for the half year ending 31st March 2022 through XBRL mode with the Stock Exchanges.  Now we are submitting the revised half yearly Related Part Transaction Report in the revised format in pdf as prescribed by SEBI in the annexure to aforesaid circular for the reporting period commencing from 1st October 2021 to 31st March 2022 as per the requirements of Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, as amended.

data.caption:
Sub: Discrepancies In Consolidated Financial Results
Re: Discrepancy: Auditors Report Not Submitted For Consolidated Financial Result - Partially Consolidated Auditor Report Received In PDF. Company Code: 517447
data.news_body:
We refer to your e-mail dated 10th May 2022 on the subject matter.

In the above context we would like to submit that the Board of Directors at the Meeting held on 22nd April 2022 approved the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the period ending 31st March 2022 and, on that date, the aforesaid Financial Results were uploaded in XBRL at the BSE Listing Centre Portal. We, on that date, also submitted the PDF copy of the signed Financial Results and Auditor's Reports in the BSE Listing Centre Portal under Outcome of the Board Meeting / Financial Results.

We are now re-submitting the signed Consolidated Audit Report dated April 22, 2022, for your kind information and records.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter As Well As Financial Year Ending March 31,2022 And Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On April 22, 2022.
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e., on April 22,2022 has approved the Company's Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Quarter as well as for the Financial Year ending March 31,2022 and the Auditor's Reports (copies enclosed).
We confirm that as per Regulation 33 (3) (e) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015 the financial results for the fourth quarter ending March 31, 2022 are derived from the figures between audited financial results in respect of the full financial year ending 31st March 2022 and the published year to date figures up-to the third quarter ending 31st December 2021.
We also confirm having submitted the Auditor's Report with unmodified opinions and the Financial Results for the period ending March 31, 2022 as per the format prescribed in Schedule III of the Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Financial Results (Audited Financial Results) For The Period Ending December 31, 2021. Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 02, 2022.
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e., on February 02, 2022, has approved the followings:

1) Approval of Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Period ending December 31, 2021, and the Auditor's Reports (copies enclosed).

The details disclosure under Regulation 52 (4) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 is attached in Annexure - A.

We confirm having submitted the Auditor's Report with unmodified opinions and the Financial Results for the period ending December 31, 2021, as per the format prescribed in Schedule III of the Companies Act 2013.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Financial Results (Audited Financial Results) For The Period Ending December 31, 2021. Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On February 02, 2022.
data.news_body:
The Board of Directors of the Company at the meeting held today, i.e., on February 02, 2022, has approved the followings:

1) Approval of Audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Results for the Period ending December 31, 2021, and the Auditor's Reports (copies enclosed).

The details disclosure under Regulation 52 (4) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 is attached in Annexure - A.

We confirm having submitted the Auditor's Report with unmodified opinions and the Financial Results for the period ending December 31, 2021, as per the format prescribed in Schedule III of the Companies Act 2013.

This is for your kind information and records only.

data.caption: Discrepancy In Standalone Financial Results For The Period Ending September 30, 2021
data.news_body:
We refer to your e-mail dated December 13, 2021 on the subject matter.

In this context we regret to inform you that we have made a typographical error in the Standalone Cash Flow Statement for the period ending 30th September 2021, wherein we typed the period of Cash Flow mistakable as on 30th June 2021, which should actually be read as 30th September 2021.

We are enclosing the Standalone & Consolidated Financial Results for the period ending 30th September 2021 along with the Auditor's Reports duly corrected the error in the Standalone Cash Flow Statement page for your kind information and records.
